ch0295_00_omodaka/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
How are you feeling today?
ch0295_00_omodaka/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll make sure to pay close attention to a young,
up-and-coming talent like yourself.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7101_0701_01_10:
The strong Trainers who have gathered on Pasio
are very interesting.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7101_0701_02_10:
If everyone here pushes each other to greater
heights, we will achieve greater synergy—of that,
I’m certain.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7101_0701_03_10:
And you, of course, are among those I have high
expectations of.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7102_0701_01_10:
Life is a never-ending journey, through unknown
lands and upon new stages.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7102_0701_02_10:
What kind of treasure do you suppose you’ll find
here on Pasio?
ch0295_00_omodaka/7102_0701_03_10:
Hmhm... I’m certain it will make you shine in the
future.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7103_0701_01_10:
The Paldea Pokémon League is made up of many
elite members.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7103_0701_02_10:
If you’re interested, please contact us. We’d be
happy to welcome someone like you.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7103_0701_03_10:
Part of my job is recruiting promising new people,
you see.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7104_0701_01_10:
I conduct periodic inspections of the Pokémon Gyms
in the Paldea region.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7104_0701_02_10:
Are they fulfilling their duty as beacons of strength
and inspiration for those aiming to achieve
Champion Rank? Or is their brilliance fading?
ch0295_00_omodaka/7104_0701_03_10:
Their Gym Leaders are all Trainers of exceptional
talent, though, and handpicked personally by me.
As such, I rarely find any cracks in their armor.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7105_0701_01_10:
This opportunity to interact with Champions and
Elite Four members from other regions is truly
valuable.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7105_0701_02_10:
And you are one of the Trainers who stands out
among them all, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0295_00_omodaka/7105_0701_03_10:
The fact that you can hold your own against a
variety of strong opponents continues to pique my
interest.
ch0295_00_omodaka/7105_0701_04_10:
I look forward to the day when I can battle you
with everything I’ve got.
ch0295_00_omodaka/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, what a coincidence. I was just thinking of
giving this to you.
ch0295_00_omodaka/1701_0702_01_10: I’m sure you will make good use of it.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2501_0701_01_10:
One of my subordinates has extremely high
standards in regards to food.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2501_0701_02_10:
If only he’d show the same enthusiasm for his
League duties...
ch0295_00_omodaka/2501_0702_01_10:
I don’t spend nearly as much time or thought on
my meals as my subordinate does.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2501_0702_02_10: After all, I’m usually busy with my job.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2501_0702_03_10:
That’s what makes the sandwiches in Paldea so
excellent. They’re not only tasty but also a quick,
easy meal.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2501_0702_04_10: The Champion of the Galar region agrees with me.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2511_0701_01_10:
I have a trait that some might say is inappropriate
for the League Chairwoman...
ch0295_00_omodaka/2511_0701_02_10:
I am utterly incapable of holding back when it
comes to Pokémon battles.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2511_0701_03_10:
But I may not have to worry about that too much
on this island.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2511_0701_04_10:
In fact, one might even consider it rude for me to
battle here with anything less than my all.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2511_0702_01_10:
Competing freely and fearlessly in battles... That
represents another facet of the true nature of
Pokémon.
ch0295_00_omodaka/2511_0702_02_10: This may be the ideal place to watch talent bloom.
ch0295_00_omodaka/3001_0701_01_10:
The bright morning light... It’s almost as if it
illuminates your future.
ch0295_00_omodaka/3003_0701_01_10:
I can see strong will in the eyes of the people on
Pasio—including you...
ch0295_00_omodaka/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening. I hope you aim to be like the stars
shining bright in the dark night.
